Title: Petty Cash
Plot: Corrine agrees to be Vic and Shane's go-between and also agrees to cooperate with Claudette and Dutch as she does so. Meanwhile, Vic comes to an understanding with Aceveda and seeks one out with Olivia; and Claudette assigns Ronnie to work with Julian to investigate the murder of a high-school football star, keeping Ronnie out of the barn and unable to intercept the letter Shane sent to Claudette detailing the Strike Team's "sins."
GuestStars: Laurie Holden, Michele Hicks, Francesco Quinn, Virginia Watson, Peter Macon, Jemal T. McNeil, Stu
